sub_news.title: Online Application Form Starts to Work!
Our Facebook page has been opened!
sub_news.text:
Our Facebook page has been opened. In this page, you may see the latest activities and news of our society.
You may enter our page by the following ways:
1. Type "Civic Education Society@THMSS" on the search bar in Facebook. 2. Copy our address http://www.facebook.com/thmsscivicedusoc to the address bar.
Be quick to add "like" on our Facebook page!
